Class CalcScore

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScoreTrack

    public class CalcScore
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScoreTrack
    Score Calculator Class ScoreTrack This class is used to compute the total score of a player
    Author:
    Davide Lorenzi, Federico Lichinchi, Luca Massini (publicObjectiveCounter method)

        public int calcScore(Player player,
                     java.util.List<PublicObjectiveCard> cards)

        Parameters:
        cards - is the list of the three public objective cards that are assigned in the game to all players
        player - player and his attributes
        Returns:
        the score of the player

      • publicObjectiveCounter

        public int publicObjectiveCounter(Player player,
                                  java.util.List<PublicObjectiveCard> cards)
        PrivateObjective Points Counter This method sums the value of the points earned by the 3 active PublicObjectiveCard
        Specified by:
        publicObjectiveCounter in interface ScoreTrack
        Parameters:
        player - is the player whose score on the public cards must be calculated
        cards - is the list of the 3 public objective cards that are assigned in the game to all players
        Returns:
        PublicObjective score that is the score obtained from the application of public cards
